title: Initialize Array with Values
description: In this lab, we will explore how to initialize and fill an array with specific values in JavaScript. We will use the Array() constructor and the Array.prototype.fill() method to create and populate the array. By the end of the lab, you will have a deeper understanding of how to create and manipulate arrays in JavaScript.

meta.title: Mastering Array Initialization in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to initialize and fill arrays with specific values in JavaScript using the Array() constructor and Array.prototype.fill() method.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, initialization, fill, javascript practice online, javascript lab, javascript tutor, array, programming

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
